means: 石鱼（背脊上的刺有毒，鱼肉鲜美）

sentence.Network_en: The appropriately named Stonefish happens to be one of the most venomous underwater species.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们是毒性最大的水下动物之一,其所携带的毒素能够导致休克、瘫痪甚至死亡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石头鱼(stonefish)通常是指同科的较大、而宽身的鲉,它们更似一旧石头。
石鱼（stonefish）是毒鲉科（Synancejidae）、毒鲉属（Synanceja）少数几种有毒海生鱼类的统称。中国有6属16种。
乌仁参/乌元参/乌球参:乌元参学名石头参(Stonefish)，常栖息于水下1.5-12米处,喜光线，腹部无绒毛，无腹足，生长周期缓慢，营养价 …

means.word_mean: 1. venomous tropical marine fish resembling a piece of rock

auth_sentence.content: The venom of the stonefish is potent and is kept in plentiful supply in glands attached to the spines of the dorsal fin.
